title: Ekspedisjon Lothepus
overview: After the success of Farmen, and the fight against cancer, Lothepus is ready for new adventures. After Fjorden Cowboys, we meet a more reflective man, who dreams of following in the footsteps of the pioneers. In each episode of Expedition Lothepus, our hero and a famous guest are on a trip to a new destination. There are hard-hitting activities, challenges and discussions about life around the campfire.
